verbs.description: The left [V: is] quickly running out of excuses for why Donald Trump 's economic policies have caused a boom rather than the bust that they predicted with such great certainty .

The left is quickly running out of excuses for why Donald Trump 's economic policies [V: have] caused a boom rather than the bust that they predicted with such great certainty .
